name: TrashMania
description:
A game about a hard working garbage sorter overworking himself sorting trash in a garbage facility. The goal of the game is to sort the trash into the correct container to gain points.  Sort too many things wrong and you lose.

Created for a game jam with a group of 5.

Programming: Epcilon, Kyyparn, Parrexion

Art: JohannaF

Music: Charmanders
